Name: Statue of Divinity with the Head of a Serpent
Description: This statue depicts divinity with the head of a serpent. It also has human ears which are attached at the neck. Divinity wears the Atef crown. This crown consists of two ram horns, two feathers, and three uraei, or cobras, which have sun disks on top of their heads. Divinity is wearing a wig and a short kilt.
